item.title: IPL 2019 Auction: Full squads of all eight teams
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: NEW DELHI: After a hectic bidding wars at the 2019 IPL player’s auction in Jaipur
item.content:encoded:
NEW DELHI: After a hectic bidding wars at the 2019 IPL player’s auction in Jaipur on Tuesday, during which a whopping RS 106.80 crore was spent.

Purse: Rs 8.4 crore
Spent: Rs 5.2 crore
Left: Rs 3.2 crore

item.title: Vivo IPL 2019 – To Be Played In India (Venue & Schedule)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Hello Dear IPL Lovers, Now Please Give Us A Smile Because Our Favourite Cricket Tournament
item.content:encoded:
Hello Dear IPL Lovers, Now Please Give Us A Smile Because Our Favourite Cricket Tournament (IPL 2019) To Be Played In India Only. So Again Every Peoples Of India Can Celebrate This IPL Festival. So Lets Start This Topic – Vivo IPL 2019 – To Be Played In India (Venue & Schedule) ,

SO FINALLY LETS TALK ABOUT DATES,

Vivo IPL 2019 Will Started From 23 March 2019. Moe Details Are Need To Be Finalised By The Official Authorities Of IPL. Supreme Court Of India Appointed Committee Of Administration In New Delhi. 

IPL 2019 TEAMS & SPENT RATES,

You Must Know This Time IPL Teams Have Spent Over ₹1,06,80,00,000 This Time. Where Total 60 Players Sold, In Which 20’s Are Over Sea’s Players. 

IPL 2019 QUALIFIED TEAMS NAME,

1. Chennai Super King
2. Kolkata Knight Riders
3. Mumbai Indians
4. Delhi Capitals
5. Kings XI Punjab
6. Rajasthan Royals
7. Sunrisers Hyderabad
8. Roya Challengers Bangalore

item.title: IPL 2019 Season-12, Date, Time, Venue, Full Fixtures, Teams, Points Table,Live Stream, Live Score, Discussion
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: IPL Schedule 2019 Season-12 Full Fixtures, Date, Time, “Venue In INDIA”, Teams, Points Table, Date
item.content:encoded:
IPL Schedule 2019 Season-12 Full Fixtures, Date, Time, “Venue In INDIA”, Teams, Points Table, Date Sheet, Matches, Live Score, Playoff, Qualifier, Results, Tickets Booking/Buy Online : Good News For Every IPL Lovers IPL Will Be Played In India, Each And Every Year We Need Some Bolstered Like IPL.

On This 12th Season Of Indian Premier League We Will See Some Great Instances. VIVO Again Will Be The Title Sponsor Of IPL In Season-12, And IPL Teams Will Remain Same- Chennai Super Kings (CSK), Mumbai Indians (MI), Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB), Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR), Sun Risers Hyderabad (SRH), Delhi Capitals (DC) Kings XI Punjab (KXIP), Rajasthan Royals (RR). Optimistically We Can Give You Guarantee That You Will Enjoy A Lot In This Year Too.

Due To Indian Premier League (IPL) Youngster’s Talent Is Increasing Year By Year And Becoming The Modern Day Sensation. In Other Words We Can Say That IPL Helping A Lot To Make Flamboyant Life For Our Indian Cricket. That’s The Reason IPL Has Completed Successful 11 Golden Years And Now 12th Is On The Way. All Teams Strive A Lot To Win This Title But Only One Team Impact In Respective Season. But In This Year 2019 IPL Will Be Hoist In India, And Finally Saved From Elections Clash.

VIVO IPL 2019 Match Schedule (Confirmed)

That’s The Reason BCCI Have Enhanced The Solution. It Depends Upon The BCCI That Which Way They Choose Where Maximum Indians Can Watch Matches. The Body Language Of BCCI Says That Till Not Any Official Conformation Has Released. So Wait And Watch Policy Will Work. You Should Know That Again Star India Will Be The Official Broadcaster Of This IPL 2019 Season-12. It Is Really Never Easy For BCCI That Popular Event Like IPL Take Away From India. Because In India All Cricket Lovers Are Mad For This. Basically We Don’t Know What Going To Happen But Consequently We Can Hope For The Best. We Can Say That It Is The Heart Breaking Moment For All The Indians That IPL Will Never Played In This Year 2019.

SO FINALLY LETS TALK ABOUT DATES,

Vivo IPL 2019 Will Started From 23 March 2019. Moe Details Are Need To Be Finalised By The Official Authorities Of IPL. Supreme Court Of India Appointed Committee Of Administration In New Delhi.

IPL 2019 TEAMS & SPENT RATES,

You Must Know This Time IPL Teams Have Spent Over ₹1,06,80,00,000 This Time. Where Total 60 Players Sold, In Which 20’s Are Over Sea’s Players.
